summary: The diff adds a non-functional marker file intended to trigger a redeploy, but there is no evidence in the changes that deployment actually completed successfully or that any deployment failure logs were captured. The diff also includes updates to project metadata/summaries that are not explicitly requested by REQ-83.

missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows repository file changes; it contains no evidence of a successful deployment result (e.g., CI/CD output, release artifact, deployment record) or any deployment-related configuration changes that would demonstrate success.

missing_requirements.requirement: If deployment fails again, provide the full deployment error output/logs so the failure can be diagnosed in a follow-up change request.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment logs or error outputs are included in the diff; only a documentation note requesting logs if a future failure occurs.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state/metadata describing chat experience enhancements (not part of a pure redeploy request).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-83 is strictly a redeploy with no behavior/UI/backend logic changes; modifying project_state.json summary/versioning to describe feature enhancements is not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend file summary listings unrelated to triggering a redeploy.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-83 does not ask to update documentation/index files like frontend-file-summaries.txt; this appears ancillary and not required to trigger a redeploy.
